t: Those*pn who trust in the Lord*s are like Mount Zion. It*ln cannot be shaken; it remains forever.
The*ln mountains surround Jerusalem and*ln the Lord*s surrounds his people, both*ln now and forever.
The*pn scepter of the wicked will not remain over*ln the land allotted to the righteous, so*ln that the righteous will not apply their hands to injustice.
Do*ln what is good, Lord,*s to the good, to*ln those whose hearts are upright.
But*ln as for those who turn aside to crooked ways, the*ln Lord*s will banish them with the evildoers. Peace*ln be with Israel.
